name: Girls' Fashion Shoot
synopsis: Enter the world of fashion and begin your career as the next top model and editor in Girls’ Fashion Shoot. Take the reins at a popular fashion magazine, become a model yourself and aim for the top by creating stylish articles to get yourself noticed. Become the Ultimate Model Professional - Become a successful model AND a powerful fashion editor. Customise Your Style - Choose from hundreds of customisable options, including nails, hairstyles, and clothing. Manage Your Success - Create stylish magazine article to establish your fashion empire. Pose Away - Create your own style, go on fashion shoots and get cover shots – you choose your own poses and look. Model Professional - Use your earnings from photo shoots to upgrade your look, your apartment and even your lifestyle.
